text: Welcome to Shoplytic, your intelligent ecommerce destination powered by AI agents. We're revolutionizing online shopping with cutting-edge technology that understands your needs and helps you find exactly what you're looking for.

Our platform uses advanced semantic search and AI agents to provide personalized shopping experiences, making it easier than ever to discover products that match your style, needs, and preferences.
To make online shopping effortless, intelligent, and delightful by leveraging AI technology to understand and serve our customers better.

- **Intelligence**: We use AI to enhance your shopping experience

Shoplytic offers a wide range of products across multiple categories:

Our intelligent search system uses semantic understanding to help you find products even when you're not sure exactly what you're looking for. Simply describe what you need, and our AI agents will find the perfect matches.

1. Browse or search for products

4. Add to cart

7. Receive order confirmation

We accept various secure payment methods:  
- Credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express)
- Digital wallets
- Bank transfers
- Buy now, pay later options (where available)  
All transactions are encrypted and secure.

We offer multiple shipping options to suit your needs:  
- **Standard Shipping**: 5-7 business days
- **Express Shipping**: 2-3 business days
- **Overnight Shipping**: Next business day (where available)  
Shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on your location and selected shipping method.
We currently ship to locations within our service areas. Shipping availability is automatically checked during checkout.
Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can track your package in real-time through our tracking system.

If you experience any delivery issues:  
- Contact our support team immediately
- Provide your order number
- We'll investigate and resolve the issue promptly

We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not happy, we're here to help.  
**Return Window**: 30 days from the date of delivery  
**Eligible Items**: Most items in new, unused condition with original packaging and tags  
**Non-Returnable Items**:
- Personalized or customized products
- Items damaged by misuse
- Products without original packaging
- Digital products (once downloaded)

1. Log into your account and navigate to "My Orders"
2. Select the item you wish to return
3. Click "Return Item" and follow the prompts
4. Print the prepaid return label
5. Package the item securely with original packaging
6. Drop off at the designated carrier location
7. Once received and inspected, we'll process your refund

- Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your return
- Original shipping costs are non-refundable (unless the item was defective or incorrect)
- Refunds are issued to the original payment method
- You'll receive an email confirmation when your refund is processed
We currently process exchanges through returns and new purchases. Return the item you don't want and place a new order for the item you prefer.
